exercises.name: scale
exercises.label: scale
exercises.description: Run up and down the scale starting on both the A and E strings.

exercises.name: 4-in-a-row
exercises.label: 4 in a row
exercises.description: Run up and down the scale starting on both the A and E strings. After each 4th note go back 3 and start again.

exercises.name: thirds
exercises.label: in thirds
exercises.description: Run up and down the scale, in steps of thirds, starting on both the A and E strings

exercises.name: fourths
exercises.label: in fourths
exercises.description: Run up and down the scale, in steps of fourths, starting on both the A and E strings

exercises.name: fifths
exercises.label: in fifths
exercises.description: Run up and down the scale, in steps of fifths, starting on both the A and E strings

exercises.name: sixths
exercises.label: in sixths
exercises.description: Run up and down the scale, in steps of sixths, starting on both the A and E strings
